name: Teen Alien in Your Closet
description:
A teen alien teleports to your closet. She's hungry, dirty and needy, and her teleporter is fried. The next step is up to you. You can throw her out or share her quest, as well as you can show her the human ways or learn about hers.

This is a free game by Pent Panda. 

You can support our work on:

patreon.com/pentpanda

Thanks for playing!
